channel.title: Brazilian on Table41NYC
channel.description: Recent content in Brazilian on Table41NYC

item.title: Churrascaria Plataforma
item.description: I like this place more than Fogo De Chao. Granted, I have not been to the NY location as of this writing. I’ve been to the LA location twice. The seasoning at this location to me was better. The salad bar was a let down comparably though. It’s small, and they have sushi there which I thought was odd. I still think M-Grill is the best as far as seasoning and char.

item.title: Ipanema
item.description: The food was surprisingly good, and it’s not pricey at all. They give you free sides of rice and beans, so no worries about ordering that.

item.title: Berimbau Do Brasil
item.description: The feijoada was pretty good. The picanha was interesting in that it was super soft. Not quite what I was expecting.
